item.description:
04-12 update: Registration for early seating has begun!

http://ronpaulaturi-es1.eventbrite.com/

This may be the closest Dr. Paul comes to CT for his 2012 run. The facebook event page is here: http://www.facebook.com/events/405756162769884/

From the event page: "Help welcome Congressman Ron Paul to the University of Rhode Island next Wednesday! You will be able to register for a free early seating voucher at a link that will be provided. It will allow you to enter the rally at 6 p.m. General attendees will be able to enter at 6:30 p.m., and the rally will start at 7 p.m."
item.name: Ron Paul Rally at University of Rhode Island
